value.excerpt: Aman Bhardwaj and Yaron Schneider join Scott Hanselman to talk about the core concepts of Distributed Application Runtime (Dapr). value.title: Troubleshoot and diagnose Azure Virtual Machines with Serial Console | Azure Friday
value.excerpt: Alfred Sin joins Donovan Brown to discuss the Azure Serial Console, which is now generally available in all public clouds. value.title: Using Azure Container Registry for building and deploying .NET Core Apps | Azure Friday
value.excerpt: You probably know that Azure Container Registry enables you to store and manage container images securely, but did you know it can also be used as a part of your DevOps pipelines?
